Package org.smartfrog.examples.pong

Class Summary
Ball Defines the utility methods for Ball object.
ConnectedGameArena Defines the Connected Game Arena for the players to communicate with each other.
GameArena Defines the Game Arena for pong game.
GameArenaWrapper A wrapper to turn the sfPong game into a SmartFrog component.
GameFrame Defines the Game Frame for pong game.
Immobile Defines the Immobile object.
Mass Defines the mass object.
Obstacle Defines the obstacle object.
Player Defines the pong player component.
Racket Defines the Racket object.
Util Defines the different utility values and key values for pong game.
